messages.message:
Brian
Hey,
I know we were both a little messed up when we met.  But I wanted to reach out and say, by association with your sister, I think you deserve better than the conditions we met under.  I know people who have taken similar wrong turns in their lives; in fact some of the most brilliant people I know have been victims of substances.  If you ever need to talk to an unbiased party, I am a positive and logical influence.

Um I'm reaaaaalllllyyyyy hoping you remember me because this is stranding out.   A lot.  But I have never seen it before. I'm going through something like.    Soul crushing.   Did I meet you through Jennifer?  You have no pics up

Brian
Yeah.  You're her sister right?  We met on new years but you had a bit too much party on to remember.  How is it going?

Brian
My original message was from years ago.  I hope everything is OK now.
